pageContext.title: OpenITI AOCP: The Open Islamicate Texts Initiative Arabic-script OCR Catalyst Project
pageContext.description_excerpt: With generous funding from The Andrew W. Mellon Foundation, OpenITI AOCP will create a new digital text production pipeline for Persian and Arabic texts. OpenITI AOCP will catalyze the digitization of the Persian and Arabic written traditions by addressing the central technical and organizational impediments stymying the development of improved OCR for Arabic-script languages.
pageContext.participants: Matthew Thomas Miller, David Smith, Maxim Romanov, Raffaele Viglianti, Sarah Bowen Savant
